# vtb_artemis_tuz (Resource)

Управление техничискими учетными записями.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "vtb_artemis_tuz" "test" {
  vtb_artemis_order_id = vtb_artemis_cluster.test.order_id
  users = [
    {
      user_name       = "test4"
      user_owner_cert = "CN=test24"
    },
    {
      user_name       = "test2"
      user_owner_cert = "CN=test23"
    },
    {
      user_name       = "test3"
      user_owner_cert = "CN=test33"
    },
    {
      user_name       = "test333"
      user_owner_cert = "CN=test334"
    },
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `users` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--users))
- `vtb_artemis_order_id` (String) Идентификатор заказа кластера VTB Artemis.

<a id="nestedatt--users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `users`

Required:

- `user_name` (String) Код пользователя. Должен быть уникальным.
- `user_owner_cert` (String) subject(owner) сертификата..

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import vtb_artemis_tuz.test <vtb_artemis_order_id>
```
